title: 2017 Alabama Crimson Tide football team
summary: The 2017 Alabama Crimson Tide football team represented the University of Alabama during the 2017 NCAA Division I FBS football season. This season marked the Crimson Tide's 123rd overall season, its 84th as a member of the Southeastern Conference (SEC) and its 26th within the SEC Western Division. They played their home games at Bryantâ€“Denny Stadium in Tuscaloosa, Alabama and were led by eleventh-year head coach Nick Saban.
